description:
Kelly King

Let’s talk about how you can bring JavaScript to board games! I love building little applications for making board games more fun, whether it be using a digital bank for Monopoly or a crowd-sourced list of words for catchphrase. Most recently I built an app that takes the pen and paper out of my favorite game, Celebrity!

* Allowing a "master" player create a unique game
* Using sockets so everyone can join the same room and submit their three celebrities
* Managing the game through the “master” player’s phone
title: Board Game JS
